short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your personal health and lifestyle assistant. You focus on getting stuff done - we'll focus on keeping you healthy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your sedentary lifestyle assistant - you focus on getting stuff done - we’ll focus on keeping you healthy.

✅ With one click, we’ll supply you with task reminders throughout your work session that ensure your body, mental well-being, and productivity will be better today, and for the future.

✅ Enjoy a stream of curated, scientifically-backed tasks to keep your body and mind healthy, while also benefiting your overall productivity. 

⚡️ Features

➤ Hours and hours of dynamic task lists that adapt to your current situation 

➤ Three unique goal modes 
Sleepiness Mode - For when you need to stay awake and alert
Focus Mode - For when you can’t afford to miss a moment of productivity
Longevity Mode - Tasks to combat lifestyle related health issues

➤Gamified progress tracking
Feel rewarded for a hard day's work.
Track your completion throughout the day.

➤Build healthy habits
Tasks will never interrupt your productivity
Reminders will come in at varying times depending on the task 

Our Guarantees:

⛔ NO ADS! 
⛔ NO SIGNUP NECESSARY!
⛔ NO DATA TRACKING!
⛔ NO PREMIUM VERSION! 
✅ COMPLETELY & 100% FREE!

**I’ve been living a way healthier life ever since I started using Sedentia - Software Engineer at Snapchat**

**Sedentia has become irreplaceable in my work routine - College Student** 

Sedentia has you covered
👁  - Eye health
🤸‍♂️ - Posture and best desk practices 
🌞 - Mental well being
✍ - Wrist health
🤩 - Long term well being 

And many many more.

Help your body, help your mind. Try Sedentia.
